gameRecap.title: Game Recap: Suns 117, Pacers 110
gameRecap.excerpt: The Suns defeated the Pacers, 117-110. Kevin Durant recorded 40 points, nine rebounds, and three blocks for the Suns, with Devin Booker adding 26 points, eight assists, and six rebounds in the victory. Buddy Hield tallied 18 points (5-8 3PM) and four rebounds in the losing effort. The Suns improve to 24-18, while the Pacers fall 24-19.
